question.text: Which of the following is not the task under reproductive and child health care (RCH) programme?

options.text: Providing facilities to build up a reproductively health society.

solution.text:
An improved program like Reproductive and Child Health Care (RCH) was launched with the following objectives :

1. Creating awareness and providing information to the people about reproduction and other related aspects :

A. Reproductive organs. B. Adolescence and related changes.

C. Safe and hygienic sexual practices. D. Sexually transmitted diseases (STD).

E. Marriageable age. F. Birth control options.

G. Care of pregnant mothers and postnatal care of the mother and child.

H. Importance of breastfeeding.

I. Massive child immunization.

2. Providing facilities and support for building up a reproductively healthy society are the major tasks under these programs.
